      • constructRowColumnUsingColumnChild

        public int constructRowColumnUsingColumnChild(java.util.List<ExcelColumn> columns,
                                              int rowStart,
                                              int rowEnd,
                                              int colStart,
                                              int colEnd)
        Construct Row and Column value by looking recursively in parent child relation
        Parameters:
        columns - - list of column : assumes parent-child relationship are already mapped
        rowStart - - initial position for excel row
        rowEnd - - ending position for excel row
        colStart - - intital position for excel column
        colEnd - - intital postion for excel column
        Returns:
        last position of child column
